Source.Name: fixesproto
Source.Description: The extension makes changes to many areas of the protocol to resolve issues raised by application interaction with core protocol mechanisms that cannot be adequately worked around on the client side of the wire.

Package.Name: fixesproto
Package.Description: The extension makes changes to many areas of the protocol to resolve issues raised by application interaction with core protocol mechanisms that cannot be adequately worked around on the client side of the wire.
